items.content_html: This is a lightweight JavaScript module that provides a simple input controller class for loop-based game development. It supports keyboard, mouse, and gamepad.
items.title: ivan-f-sokolov/guki-input-controller: This is a lightweight JavaScript module that provides a simple input controller class for loop-based game development. It supports keyboard, mouse, and gamepad.

items.title: clebert/sonnar: A lightweight TypeScript API for constructing XPath 1.0 expressions.

items.content_html: A lightweight, in-memory document database. Use it in node, the browser, or embed it into your electron app.
items.title: node-prism/arc: A lightweight, in-memory document database. Use it in node, the browser, or embed it into your electron app.

items.content_html: Easy Web Worker is a lightweight and easy-to-use library for creating web workers in JavaScript applications. With Easy Web Worker, you can move computationally expensive tasks and logic off the main thread and into a separate thread, improving the performance and responsiveness of your application.
items.title: johnny-quesada-developer/easy-web-workers-example: Easy Web Worker is a lightweight and easy-to-use library for creating web workers in JavaScript applications. With Easy Web Worker, you can move computationally expensive tasks and logic off the main thread and into a separate thread, improving the performance and responsiveness of your application.

items.content_html: cancelable-promise-jq is a lightweight library that helps you manage and organize asynchronous callbacks in your JavaScript code. It provides a simple interface for registering and triggering callbacks, as well as managing their execution order.
items.title: johnny-quesada-developer/cancelable-promise-jq: cancelable-promise-jq is a lightweight library that helps you manage and organize asynchronous callbacks in your JavaScript code. It provides a simple interface for registering and triggering callbacks, as well as managing their execution order.
